mapper.select: SELECT sb.source_seq AS sourceSeq ,cc.code_nm AS langNm ,cc.code AS langCd ,wu.user_id AS userId ,sb.title ,sb.content ,DATE_FORMAT(sb.edit_date,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS editDate ,DATE_FORMAT(sb.reg_date,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS regDate FROM source_board sb LEFT OUTER JOIN white_user wu ON wu.user_seq = sb.user_seq LEFT OUTER JOIN cmm_code cc ON sb.lang_cd = cc.code WHERE sb.source_seq = #{sourceSeq}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO source_board(user_seq, lang_cd, title, content, edit_date, reg_date) VALUES( #{userSeq}, #{langCd}, #{title}, #{content}, NOW(), NOW() )
mapper.update: UPDATE source_board SET title = #{title}, lang_cd = #{langCd}, content = #{content}, edit_date = NOW() WHERE user_seq = #{userSeq} AND source_seq = #{sourceSeq}
mapper.select: SELECT sg.source_guide_seq AS sourceGuideSeq ,sg.lang AS lang ,sg.title AS title ,sg.edit_date AS editDate ,wu.user_id AS userId FROM source_guide sg LEFT OUTER JOIN white_user wu ON wu.user_seq = sg.user_seq ORDER BY sb.source_seq DESC LIMIT ${pagePre}, ${pageSize}
